NAME: Ramesh Bafna
ABOUT:
Ramesh Bafna is currently Head of Finance for Myntra & Jabong and is passionately leading to solve for Fashion e-commerce in India.

Prior to this he was Senior Director Finance with Flipkart, leading 3 Business Units - Fashion & Fashion Private Labels, Home & Furniture and Books & General Merchandise. He was also working on launching 2 more strategic business units. Prior to this Ramesh Bafna helped turnaround the Marketplace business towards sustainable growth by working backwards from customer experience & upstreaming it all the way to sellers. Ramesh also built the FP&A function grounds up at Flipkart.

Ramesh Bafna is very passionate about internet industry, solving problems at scale, leveraging digital technologies to solve problems, very passionate about his team & most importantly works with a growth mindset. 

Prior to working with Flipkart, Ramesh Bafna was groomed in Wipro Limited, working across divisions spanning from Internal Audit to Controllership to FP&A to Business Finance to Treasury based in India & Singapore.

Ramesh Bafna is a Chartered Accountant by education & very active leader in building a learning culture within the organization.
